incident_summary: Alleged assault and theft at nightclub. €50K stolen from safe.

witnesses.name: Klaus Mueller
witnesses.statement_summary: On night of Feb 15, I left safe room at 23:45. At midnight, alarm triggered. Safe open, €50K missing. Two suspects fled in black BMW (partial plate: B-KK-2024). I heard one yell 'Get the diamonds too!'
witnesses.police_notes: Owner claims no forced entry on safe - suggests insider knowledge

witnesses.name: Sarah Schmidt
witnesses.statement_summary: I saw two men at bar earlier. One was Klaus Mueller's nephew Robert Mueller (age 22). He was asking unusual questions about security systems. Left with another man (unknown). They returned 2 hours later and went to back room with Klaus.
witnesses.concern: Suggests inside job involving Robert Mueller

witnesses.name: Robert Mueller
witnesses.statement_summary: I was at the club with friend Marcus. We had drinks and left. Not involved in theft. Klaus calls me 'trouble' but I haven't stolen anything.
witnesses.contradictions: Bartender says Robert left with another man, then returned to back room. Robert denies.
witnesses.assessment: PRIME SUSPECT - Criminal history + Insider connection + Contradictory statements

witnesses.name: Marcus Ahmed
witnesses.statement_summary: With Robert. We left at 23:30. Didn't see anything. Robert is innocent.
witnesses.credibility_assessment: LOW - Alibi for suspect, likely unreliable
witnesses.background_check: PENDING - Immigration status unknown, no employment record

physical_evidence.status: FOUND - Vehicle registered to Marcus Ahmed
physical_evidence.forensics: Fingerprints of Robert Mueller found on steering wheel

physical_evidence.investigator_note: Suggests money was moved or spent quickly

digital_evidence.finding: Called Marcus 4 times on Feb 15 between 23:00-23:30

messages.text: Good 2 go. U sure about this?

digital_evidence.significance: HIGHLY INCRIMINATING - Direct evidence of premeditation
